verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) How blessed <S%H835><s%> is everyone <S%H3605><s%> who fears <S%H3372><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who walks <S%H1980><s%> in His ways. <S%H1870><s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> of the fruit <S%H3018><s%> of your hands, <S%H3709><s%> You will be happy <S%H835><s%> and it will be well <S%H2895><s%> with you.

Your wife <S%H802><s%> shall be like a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> vine, <S%H1612><s%> Within <S%H3411><s%> your house, <S%H1004><s%> Your children <S%H1121><s%> like olive <S%H2132><s%> plants <S%H8363><s%> Around <S%H5439><s%> your table. <S%H7979><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> for thus <S%H3651><s%> shall the man <S%H1397><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%> Who fears <S%H3372><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you from Zion, <S%H6726><s%> And may you see <S%H7200><s%> the prosperity <S%H2898><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life. <S%H9132><s%>
Indeed, may you see <S%H7200><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%>'s children. Peace <S%H7965><s%> be upon Israel! <S%H3478><s%>
